channel.title: Wizard of Oz on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Wizard of Oz on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Major ‘Wizard of Oz’ Profits Could Push Sphere Toward More Movie Reimaginings
item.description: The film will push James Dolan’s unique Vegas venue to $500 million in gross profits next year, Wolfe Research estimates, which may bode well for the venue to recreate other classic titles.

item.title: Major ‘Wizard of Oz’ Profits Could Push Sphere Toward More Movie Reimaginings
item.description: The film will push James Dolan’s unique Vegas venue to $500 million in gross profits next year, Wolfe Research estimates, which may bode well for the venue to recreate other classic titles.

item.title: How The Sphere Remade ‘The Wizard of Oz’s’ Famous Score: “All the Numbers Have to Sparkle”
item.description: Veteran composer David Newman was tapped to re-record the entire score with a live orchestra.

item.title: How The Sphere Remade ‘The Wizard of Oz’s’ Famous Score: “All the Numbers Have to Sparkle”
item.description: Veteran composer David Newman was tapped to re-record the entire score with a live orchestra.

item.title: Inside Opening Night of ‘Wizard of Oz’ at the Sphere: “We’re Finally Off to See the Wizard”
item.description: The immersive experience — featuring flying monkeys, falling apples and one wild tornado — debuted in Las Vegas on Thursday.
